snippet: Eagles receiver Riley Cooper returned to the team on Tuesday after being caught on film yelling a racial slur at a concert.
abstract: NFL Roundup; remorseful wide receiver Riley Cooper returns to Philadelphia Eagles following four-day excused absence to undergo sensitivity training after he was caught on film yelling a racial slur before a Kenny Chesney concert; other football news noted.

byline.original: By THE ASSOCIATED PRESS and KEN BELSON

lead_paragraph: Eagles receiver Riley Cooper returned to the team on Tuesday after being caught on film yelling a racial slur at a concert.
